solution_line_template: On the first day Chandra saw {monsters_day1} monsters and on day 2 she saw twice that amount, {monsters_day1} x {multiplier_double} = <<{monsters_day1}+{multiplier_double}={monsters_day2}>>{monsters_day2} monsters seen on day 2.
On day 3 she saw double that amount of monsters, {monsters_day2} x {multiplier_double} = <<{monsters_day2}*{multiplier_double}={monsters_day3}>>{monsters_day3}.
On day 4 she saw double that amount of monsters, {monsters_day3} x {multiplier_double} = <<{monsters_day3}*{multiplier_double}={monsters_day4}>>{monsters_day4}.
On day 5 she saw double that amount of monsters, {monsters_day4} x {multiplier_double} = <<{monsters_day4}*{multiplier_double}={monsters_day5}>>{monsters_day5}.

Altogether Chandra saw {monsters_day1} + {monsters_day2} + {monsters_day3} + {monsters_day4} + {monsters_day5} lost monsters = <<{monsters_day1}+{monsters_day2}+{monsters_day3}+{monsters_day4}+{monsters_day5}={total_monsters}>>{total_monsters} total lost monsters that Chandra needs to lead back to the swamps.
